content.detailedDescription: My wife and i woke up to a loud noise flying directly over our house at 2:00 am. it was a low humming sound accompanied by a repetitive rapping/banging sound. for lack of a better comparison, it sounded like a harley-davidson flying over our house at about 50 miles per hour, and it was much different than the sound of a helicopter as there was a sort of deep, clunking sound at the rate of 5-10 per second. as the first object passed there was another one that followed a few seconds later, as if one ufo was following closely behind the other. we had gotten 13 inches of snow that night so vehicles were non-existent. i woke up immediately thinking ufo as the sounds were so foreign to me and they were traveling over our house in a path perpendicular to the road. my wife thought it was a snow plow at the time, but woke up realizing the plows hadn't gone through at all yet, and didn't until 7:30 am. i'm convinced this was a ufo and am curious to learn if anybody else heard anything that night, or better yet saw something.
content.summary: Two ufo's heard flying over our house

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my wife were walking into the giant food grocery story located at 6800 richmond highway alexandria, va 22306-1704. we were facing north. we first noticed the object just as we were about to go in. i saw it and asked my wife "what is that?". she saw it and said she didn't know and then continued to walk into the grocery store. i stayed outside and continued to slowly walk in the direction of the object and took several pictures with my iphone camera.

when i first saw the object, i thought it could be a group of black balloons or a blimp. it was large enough to be noticeable in the sky and was black. the black shape was easy to see against the grey clouds of the sky. it was moving too slowly to be an airplane and did not look like a helicopter. it seemed to change shape slightly like a group of balloons would but it seemed to be very high up and would need to be a very large balloon. as i walked toward it and took more pictures i saw a very small dot like object slowly circle the larger object at least once at what seemed like very close range. there were several commercial airplanes flying off to the east as they took off from reagan national airport. they looked larger then the object from my perspective but this could mean they were closer as well.

as the object moved away i couldn't make out any more detail and went inside the grocery store.

i was very excited about the sighting but when i got home my pictures barely showed anything.
content.summary: Black object over alexandria, va appearing to travel northwest towards washington dc

content.detailedDescription:
February 19,2011 about 1am coming home from a night out. driving on the 5 freeway north bound in la mirada c.A me and my guy saw a ufo over the freeway it seem to be 30 feet long with bright yellow/amber lights rotating. you can tell the other cars on the freeway saw this ufo because cars were slowing and some stopping looking at the bright thing in the sky. it seem to be square rectangular [_________________] with what look like small box shape/ windows [_] of brite yellow/amber lights that seem to rotate and it seem to glide or hover.

where were you and what were you doing at the time?
on freeway in car

what made you first notice the object?
bight yellow amber lights

what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
ufo

describe the object and its actions and motions.
long square/rectangular brite lights that seem to rotate and it seem to float or glide.

describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
i kept saying no way and opened the sunroof of the car and stuck my head out to get a better view and after words just kept talking about it.

how did you lose sight of the object?
after it past over it was going south as we were going north on freeway and just lost sight of it.
content.summary: Ufo over 5 freeway c.A

content.detailedDescription:
On december 22nd, 2010 at approximately 18:10 while at work, i was observing aircraft that left persistent contrails, when i noticed in the sky what appeared to be a spherical object that appeared to flash or reflect light as if it had large and small facets and slowly rotated, although no obvious exterior surface irregularities or distortions.  

i observed the object hovering for approximately, less than one minute, in the north northwesterly direction approx. 30 deg.���s from the celestial median at which time i walked quickly to the nearby office (approx.60 ft. away) and retrieved a pair of 10x50 bushnell binoculars, returned to my previous position and continued to observe the object with the aid of the binoculars.

i then obtained a clear visual acquisition of what appeared to be a uniformly spherical object, with a dull silver/aluminum alloy external appearance. there continued to be what appeared to be reflections emitted by the object. i was unable to see any uneven surface characteristics which would cause these reflections. 

   within the following one minute time frame the object began to proceed to the north northeasterly direction, with a wide turn to the north for 90 seconds until it was downrange sufficiently and no longer visible. the object appeared to be at an altitude of approximately 8000 ��� 10,000 ft., i make this assumption based on the presents of scattered cirrus clouds (estimated altitude of 23,000 - 25,000 ft.) as reference points as the object passed underneath these small clouds. 

the object caught my attention because it did not appear to be visually consistent with any known aircraft or aircraft configurations that i typically observe. it did not appear to be a balloon as it clearly demonstrated controlled flight at a speed inconsistent with balloon operation with the current wind conditions at the time of the sighting. 

  this december 22nd incident was the second sighting within a little more than week���s time.
 i had very briefly viewed a similar object approximately one week to ten days prior to this sighting. it was during this time i decided to take the initiative to be more vigilant in my observation of the surrounding sky. it was also at this time i decided to bring a camera to work with me to record, if possible, any further unusual sightings thus giving credence to any report of a sighting. it is in my opinion that an unverified or unsubstantiated report does not always bare the same significance when compared to a report with photographic evidence. 
   
at 18:44 january 3rd, 2011 while at work, i was observing and photographing aircraft that left persistent contrails when i observed an object similar to the object i had previously seen (a spherical metallic looking object that appeared to flash or reflect light as if it had large and small facets and slowly rotated). 
the object was stationary and i observed the object for 10 seconds before training a camera in the direction and taking one photograph. i then relocated myself to a position approximately 10-15 feet away for an unobstructed view. i then took two more additional photographs within a four second time frame. total elapsed time frame for the three photographs was 50 seconds. there appeared to be no directional of the object. the object remained visible for one additional minute following my last photograph and as i redirected my attention to my camera for a readjustment, i looked back up into the sky and the object was no longer visible. 
i continued photographing distant aircraft with eight more photos taken of the adjacent area. no object(s) can be seen in any of these photos. my last photo was taken at 18:55:10, at which time i felt i had possibly captured on digital image what i had seen. within 25 minutes the sky in the vicinity of the objects was dark enough to allow the light from any possible celestial body to be displayed and there were no celestial bodies comparable to this size, in this area or below this area that could be seen. 
now, please take note, the image that i have captured on digital imaging is not what the object actually appeared like as i watched it visually with my eye sight, as the object actually appeared to be dull metallic. when i returned home later that night, downloaded the images to my computer and examined them, i noticed the difference in their appearance and i then found another object, to the left and further in the distance which looks similar to the object that i captured on the digital images that i had originally seen.  
the camera i was using was an olympus d-545z, 4 megapixel ccd digital imaging.

content.detailedDescription:
Back in 1996, during a 2week period of time, i witnessed four events on different nights, that seem to be all ufo related. for a long time before any of that my mom would call to me at night from down below my balcony. she would always be talking about how a star up high was a ufo because it was not just white. i did not think one way about it or the other, because i had never witnessed anything like that. anybody in the world can give me a polygraph or hypnosis or whatever about anything that i have ever said that i witnessed, and i would pass because i have no doubts. those four times were the only times that i've ever witnessed any ufo activity, but since i was 7or8 years old, i've witnessed all sorts of paranormal things and haven't known who to tell that can really make sense as to why. anyway, here's the story.

one night about 2am back in 1996, i was sitting indian style on my balcony with my headphones on.I had the lights on out there, and felt like something was looking at me or something. i turned my head to the right and looked down. what i saw that night no words can describe. i immediately saw 4 white lights in equal distance apart, and i slowly stood up with the railing, and took off my headphones. there was a craft hovering the ground down beside my house. there was a semi-circle on top where it appeared someone or something could see me out of. as i stood there, my jaw dropped in fear and amazement. i was not about to make any sudden movements,because i don't know anything about them,and it did not either.That craft was longer and wider than my house,and slowly came up over the top of my balcony where i was,and the middle of it stopped and hovered silently above me.There were alot of very small white lights on the bottom;a lot of a little bit bigger neon green ones and in the center was one big red blinking one. as it did, white smoke came out of it. i was frozen with fear but in complete awe.It defied all logic and gravity. after a few minutes, it slowly went on passed, and went up into the east until i couldn't see it anymore.After that,one night i saw millions of moving red lights in the fence rows. another night, i saw 2 trianglar ufos,one behind the other flying high from east to west. i came home from a friend's at night and my mom,dad,aunt,and uncle were looking at a white circle at the top of trees with something flying through it every few seconds.
about a month after all of that happened, i was up with my dad in the kitchen getting ready to go to high school.We would listen to the trading post and drink coffee before hand. i had my hair in a ponytail and proceded to walk back to go get my books, when my dad shreaked,jumped, and said what's that?! i asked him what he was talking about and went to the bathroom to look and see. behind my left ear was a brown circle about the size of a dime.Dad was right in that it favor a ringworm but it wasn't. it favored one,because it was just a brown,lined circle with my skin color inside, but never any itching or burning.Over years of time, the mark would fade and get smaller. if it is completely gone now it has only been in the last year or so and i am 31 now. ive always been scared after that happened to come forward, but watching a ufo program on tv was the first time i had ever heard of mufon and i thought i should even after all this time so maybe those who love to know the real truth will know.
content.summary: Large rectangular craft flying over my house

content.detailedDescription:
visiting cousins in freemont, neb.. my sister, brother, two cousins, and myself had just gotton back from watching grease the movie at the local theater. we'd asked if we could sleep outside and had just made our bed in the back of an el comino in the front yard. we we're running around playing tag when i noticed it had gotton completly silent. as i looked into the sky i noticed something slowly emerging over the tree tops. i called for my sister and brother and two cousins to look at what i was seeing. we stood in a group and watched as the craft became one quarter visible to use. it was obvious it was huge as the portion we could see seemed to take up our entire corner of the property. 

   it was difficult to see againt the night sky, even though it was right over head. it appeared to have a rounded edge as this seemed to be the most "solid". yet still there were lights all around at different points. i remember really trying to figure out just how they were attached at it seemed that they were at the end of spike like protrutions or some cases anteneas. i think my mind was just trying to get a better picture by trying to fill in the blank, transparent, cloaked or just hard to see portions.  

  at this point, as we stood together, my sister yelled to look at the side window. as i looked, my eyes adjusted to sight of rectangle windows on the visible edge of the ship. we could make out the image of one "being" in the window. then we realized that another being moved over to the right of the first figure. we were looking at a spaceship and aliens and we knew it. i ran to the house and stood in the doodway yelling for my uncle and grandfather to come outside and see that there was a spaceship over the house. they were watching johnny carson and told me it was a weather baloon. i ran back to the yard passing my cousin who was now going to the house to yell for them.   they never came outside.   
at this point the craft moved over a field to a small air field across the street about a mile away. it hovered over the rotating airport light and got very, very bright. it then passed back over head. i got excited thinking it was coming back for us but, it passed and started following a fright trains main engine. the engine ran it's horn, "i know there's an engineer out there somewhere who should be able to remember this" the craft lit up again very bright as it followed the engine for a half mile or so before it slowly lifted away. the last thing it did was quickly move to the south, then up, and in a huge z patern, shot away so quickly i could make out the z shape for a split second. my brother can barely remember the event. my sister and i have the same memory but, we are the oldest. writting this account has made me want to get us all together and get hypnotized just to find out what (if anything) happend to us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering craft over five children

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were coming back from our buddys house and see this sufo over weston field in scranton. we saw people looking at it i don;t have a cam or i would of had great footage of it. there was no sound from it it was a triangle shap with 3  main lights and some smaller light.
content.summary: 2 orangeish and yellow lights on one side with a red light going back anf forth between the 2 bigger lights, and one more orange yellow light on the otherside.

content.detailedDescription:
2/18/2011 at about 6:30pm, my husband and i went out for dinner. headed to pepe's on 159th street in tinley park.  we left our subdivision and headed north on 88th ave towards 191st. i looked to my right and saw several, very bright, white lights in the sky. my husband noticed them as well. we continued driving down 191st towards harlem and watched the lights the entire time. we couldn't figure out what we were looking at. when we turned onto harlem, heading north, our view became obstructed.  it was about that time i noticed two planes (i think they were planes...Could only see their lights) and it appeared to me they were flying low and very fast towards the lights. we had no clue what was going on but will never forget it.

the next night (2/19/2011) around the same time (6:15pm) my husband left the house to go to jewel to pick up things he needed for his nascar party the next day.  he called me from his truck to tell me he saw the lights again. instead of going to the store, he turned around and picked me up. i grabbed the camcorder and we headed down 191st again.  we drove down 191st and just past harlem ave, we pulled over.  i got out of the truck and start recording.  i have video footage of these lights. this time though, they were not white.  they were orange.  they appeared to be changing colors and were in a triangular formation. as i continued recording, the lights (all at the same time) suddenly blew up (i don't think they really blew up...I just don't have the words to describe what i recorded). the lights were gone for maybe a second or two and then reappeared.  they continued to do this (suddenly bursting and then reappearing again).  truly the oddest thing we've ever seen and i am hoping someone will be interested in my video.  it would be great if someone could explain what we saw because i sure can't.

i can't email the video. i tried to send it to a friend but the attachment was too large and google would not let it go through. please let me know how i can get it to you.
content.summary: Orange lights in sky of triangle shape. turned off and on.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch because i went outside to smoke a cigarette when i noticed this object up in the sky it caught my attention because it flashed a few times and kept changing in brightness then it started to move to my right and i watched it go up into the clouds  when i first noticed it i was stunned because the first thing i thought was oh my god thats a freakin ufo just based on its shape and the way it moved through the sky there was no stream like you would see from a jet and it manuevered to quickly to be a small plane. it began diving in and out of the clouds in a clockwise circular motion down towards the treeline. the storm cluds were gathering so i beleive that puts the object at around 2000 feet when i first saw it and i would have to guess its distance from my point of view was around five to ten miles away i was whitish silver and spherical or maybe circular it was hard to tell from that distance i watched it form a few minutes and i was mesmerised by it because i couldnt beleive what i was seeing in my own backyard figuratively speaking. i remember thinking that i had to document this or noone will beleive me so i ran inside to grab my camera its a sony cybershot with a 10 megapixel resolution but only a four times zoom when i came back outside the object had moved into the clouds and i lost sight of it i then regained sight of the object a few moments later and noticed it heading off to the northwest i tried my best to capture it on film but theres only so much you can do with a four times zoom i did get a video a little over a minute long and i must have watched it twenty times now and i cant pinpoint exactly where it is in the video.  the second time i lost sight of it moved off in a straight line into the clouds far out on the horizon if anyone wishes to view the video for themselves i have it on my computer and i made copies on discs however i think you are going to need some sort of video enhancing software to really dig through it and get some good hard evidence from it i apologize for the crappy quality and wish i could have got it sooner but i was pretty much dumbstruck by this thing. i also wanted to add that i was a physics major for a little over a year before i left college and this thing just behaved in a way that i found made me question wether or not i was actually seeing what i thought i was seeing it was just wierd... i alsoi called some of the small local airports in the area that night and left messages asking if there were any planes in the area saying that i saw something strange and as of today february 20 2011 i have gotten no responses
content.summary: Strange object over kittaning pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription:
One day a friend told me that he saw a ufo in the sky. one day i went to the denists office and took a picture of him. i went to a website  and i saw a picture of him and it turns out that his real name is xavier 278 and i went and then we took a picture of a guy named irving and we went to the website and it turns out that once he was on a ship and another alien pushed him off the ship accidentally .And he landed in syria and irving bought him there and sold him to the dentists office and he made up a lie that if you have ever had mint gum then your tung is too big. x-avier278 told everyone that lie and he made up this thing called a y-ray wich is an x-ray for your mouth and a kid came in to the office and the dentist put a cream that made you have a rash around your mouth and then when the dental hygienist came in and every time she tried to do a y-ray he couldn't open his mouth because of the cream and then when the dental hygienist went to call the dentist the dentist put water on the kids mouth so to wash of the cream but then xavier278 was purpesly making the y-ray not fit in the kids mouth so the kid had to com back next time. when the kid was leaving he saw a line on floor so he followed it and it led him to the cream that the dentist put on his mouth. so he disabled it and broke it and the the dentist had to clean it up and threw it into the garbage.When the dentist was finished cleaning up the cream he went to one of the rooms and saw one of his robot friends from the ship his name was x-avier279 and he said that another robot pushed him off the ship by accedint and then he said the exact same story that the dentist said so now the two of them were friends forever.

i was at home and 4 hours after it happened i got a phone call and i asked if we should report it and my friend said no but i thought that we should so thats why i reported it.


i was frightend
content.summary: A friend told me that a ufo was in the sky that day and i saw him at a dentists office.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were having a early b-day party for my son and i w/my mother -in law over (which doesn't believe in ufo's), my husband came inside from taking the garbage out and said..There is something weird in the sky..We all went outside (me, my husband, my 3 sons' and my mother-in-law) we all saw 2 different lights in the sky that stayed in one spot only moving a little to right then a little to the left then around in a circle..They were closer than the stars and further away from an airplane..They changed colors from white, to blue to a little red.  not one of us believe in ufo's but this really freaked all of us out..They are still in the sky..We had no video camera just binoculars..And from what we all saw..Scared us and now we are all really wondering if this is ufo sightings..Later tonight i looked on utube and saw a video of someone on same night..Tonight but in washington dc take video of same thing we saw and have been seeing..We can still see it in the sky and my husband is currently going to a friends to borrow a better lens of some kind so we can see better of what it is..But i am freaked out..A plane went by and it is not a plane- and they are not stars or other planets!!  if anyone else has seen something tonight- please contact me asap!! this is no joke!! it's 1:25am and i am so scared that i can not sleep!!  i truly did not ever believe in something like this until now!! neither has anyone else in my family that saw this with me!!
content.summary: It was closer than stars but further away from airplane-  was white then changed colors from white, blue and then some red- there is 2 of them

content.detailedDescription:
i was pulling into my driveway and noticed a fairly bright orb heading in my direction.  i got out of my vehicle as it was flying over my neighborhood (almost directly over my house).  no blinking lights were observable and no noise from the craft could be heard.  this craft was fairly low as it flew by faster than aircraft i've seen leaving the airport.  i observed the craft until it flew out of sight which was a very short amount of time.  when i could no longer see the craft, i went in the house and told my wife and mother-in-law what i had just seen.  

it was difficult to judge the height of the craft at night, but i could tell it was low enough for me to hear the engines/jets if it was a conventional aircraft.  i took a picture with my iphone but it's not note worthy.  the orb was very fluid in movement as if it was moving with no drag through the sky. the glowing orb was unlike anything i've ever seen.  there is an airport close by and i served in the military and know what conventional aircraft (civilian and military)look like.  i hope others in my area have seen what i saw.
content.summary: When i was pulling into my driveway a glowing orb was heading over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work around 11:35pm.  on mission road near the lincoln hgt dmv and plaza de la raza.  i noticed what looked like a light was reflecting on the bottom of a hang glider (that's the only way i can describe it) it had two separate points of light.  as i moved forward in my car i at a point was directly under it,  it was not two separate parts it was plasma looking lights that were on a circular vehicle.  the object was moving toward the san gabriel mountains. as i proceeded toward downtown los angeles it was then on the right side of my car.  it had two separate panels of light, box in formation.  these lights lit randomly almost like something was broke or malfunctioning on the machine. the top had a pulsating red light but it didnt strobe like on an airplane it would stay on for a while then turn off.  im not sure how to say it but all of the outside of the vehicle was circulating left to right around the craft in a circle.  like the outside circle was connected but separated from the main body.  like the picture on this sight but a flat bottom and the whole thing was the same size equal in demention.  as i continued driving there was a police car that was ahead of me that pulled over one of the the officers got out and started watching it.  at this point the thing was maybe 3miles away and from what i saw the lights went out completely.  we just got done with an unusual sever storm 2-3hrs before the incident.  i was on the phone with my mother in madison wisconsin during the whole thing describing everything to her. it lasted probably 2-3mins if that.  while it was moving it was kind of a swooping motion it did pause at points but it moved very continuously forward no rapid changes of direction yet it was moving very fast.  i came home and drew a picture of what i saw.  went over the events with my mother again and my boyfriend. i was shaky and anxious.  i don't have any pictures but i have the drawing that i drew when i got home.
content.summary: Bottom lite like two seperat parts, circular disck shape lights on sides not windows, lighting like malfunctioning

content.detailedDescription:
I am his friend and can get on the internet and he can't.
call him for details of these 3 sightings (1 witness).
content.summary: 3 sightings over a few months

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were parked on a back road watching the stars near avenue d on the west side of yuma. we started to see a couple of orange lights flash on in a row and then turn off one by one. we thought they were flares at first, but we didn't see any smoke coming from the lights. we were getting a little sad that we didn't have enough time to grab the camera and catch it, when all the sudden more lights turned on. excited and a little scared, i grabbed my camera and started recording. these lines of lights showed up a few times but i always managed to miss it all due to the fact that when they appeared it was only for a couple seconds. this is the best video that captured exactly what we saw. there was no noise at all, no sounds of planes, and no smoke coming from the lights. after seeing what we saw in the video, the lights stopped lighting up and we did not see them anymore. 

in the video there is one light that shows up at the beginning and then right around the 3 minute mark is when a whole bunch showed up.
content.summary: Lights turning on and off in a line

content.detailedDescription: It was the late 70's and i was about 10. i believe it was possibly november. it was dark and there was no snow on the ground. my dad asked me to pick up bread at the store about 1 1/2 blocks away. i left my house on houde st in nashua nh and headed south, 2 house distance, to will st, turned left ,east, and walked to the next corner, 2 house ditance, and stopped at stop sign on corner of will st and 12th st. i looked down 12th st north to check for no traffic so i could cross to store parking lot and there it was. a 100-150 ft flying saucer hovering silently and motionless about 150 ft over 12th st and extending over houses on both side of road. it was metallic in color and on the bottom it had flashing lights of many differant colors flashing randomly all over the bottom. i was about 500ft to the south of the craft and stared for about 30 seconds in amazment when the craft started to slowly come towards me. i ran across the st into soucys market parking lot and ran into store. there was 3 cashiers and noone else in the store. they asked what was wrong and when i told them i saw a ufo they just laughed. i bought the bread and reluctantly left the store looking all over the sky but ufo was gone. i started back continually looking around sky and when i came to the same spot i had seen it the first time i was looking down 12th st and at the end of the road is ledge st school and woods behind that. i was looking in that direction and seen it. it was about 500ft into woods and lifted up as if it were on the ground to just above tree level and it started back towards me at about 30mph when it was at about the school i ran home for what i thought was my life, i ran inside and told my dad, sister, her boyfriend, and his friend. they all laughed and wouldnt go check. after several minutes of begging them to look we all went out and looked but it was gone and didnt come back. they thought i was crazy or looking for attention. i told friends at school the next day but they laughed. i kept trying to tell my story but noone believed me so i stopped telling it. i have always thought of it though and know for a fact that ufo's exsist and noone can tell me otherwise. i have been thinking alot about ufo's lately and after watching ancient aliens i felt i had to tell my story.
content.summary: About 100-150ft metallic,multy colored lights shimmering on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my home smoking. i like to watch aircraft approaching mccarran. saw a southwest 737 on downwind for 25l, and anotheir aircraft climbing after take off from runway 19l/r.

i saw a very fast and bright object approached, seem lower but faster than the south west aircraft, also, it wasn't traveling on the same direction, it was heading towards the ne of the city as opposed to the southwest ac flying to the east on downwind.
at first i taught it was an aircraft, but i taught it was too bright, so i stared at it waiting to see the aircraft lights (anti collision and strobes) but the more it kept on traveling i could not see aircraft lights. i taught maybe it was the angle at which the object was moving, so i kept on watching it, but the furtheir it went away, i could still not see aircraft lights, also it was traveling way faster than the otheir aircraft on the air at that time, suddenly it became lees bright and became more like a dim star but it kept on moving. i calculate the object being over mccarran or furtheir away, when it completely dim out and disappeared like it was their and then it wasn't.

i don't think it was a meteor, as it was flying level, and it also decelerated, also; i saw it flying level for over 2 minutes.

i hope some one at the tower/person or other aircraft saw it.
content.summary: Fast moving bright object

content.detailedDescription:
There were 12-15 people sitting around a campfire, 2 of us have green lazers(star pointers) that we use during the day for tree estimates.  we were pointing at stars and everything in the sky.  i was pointing straight accross from us at stars and 2 lights appeared.  my friend said point it at the airplane at that time i turned it off and said that you shouldn't do that.  we continued to watch these 2 lights come towards us, they were moving slow and no flashing lights.  they came to hover where i think that they could see us.  they hovered for several minutes enough time for my friend to catch some photos of these lights.  after several minutes had passed 1 of the lights went straight up in the sky and vanished the other went out away from us and blipped away.
just then the five of that saw these lights said did you see that what was that.
the strangest thing of the experience is that out of 15 of us only 5 saw these and the whole time we were watching we never said look at those lights in the sky to anyone else.  we were stunned by what we had seen.  not sure if they were craft or entities.
content.summary: 2 orbs in sky at 10k festival orangish red on top and white on bottom

content.detailedDescription: It all started out with my wife and i traveling south on us 283 towards coleman, tx at night.  with my cruise control set, the radio tuned and near perfect driving conditions i was set for the long haul south to san antonio.  driving down the dark, desolate highway with hardly any traffic i remained focused on the highway searching for the one line backer deer to confront my three quarter ton truck.  in the course of driving i looked over to see a green sign telling me i had ten miles to coleman and my wife telling me to look over at the full moon that was on its way up like a homesick angel.  i gazed at the moon for several seconds and observed several airliners passing by along with a low flying airplane with distinguishable nav lights and anti-collision lights.  we continued driving when my wife said look at the satellite moving across the sky towards the moon.  with a clear sky i was able to locate the moving object and watched it travel from the south to the east and disappear as most satellites do.  i continued my drive down the highway when my wife pointed towards the moon and said look.  i looked and observed an orange light directly below the rising moon which appeared stationary for several seconds and then disappeared.  my first thought was dyess air force base was in nearby abilene and that the b-1b bombers were out playing and lighting the afterburners.  i continued to search for the orange light for several minutes with no sight.  finally we arrived in coleman, tx.  i located a pizza hut off the highway and pulled in for some gratification. as i exited my truck i looked towards the moon and saw the same color object, but smaller in size with no movement or noise.  usually if a bomber with a lit afterburner was near we would hear the rumble.  i told my wife, but she missed that sighting.  we walked in grabbed a few pizzas and sat down at a booth facing towards the direction of the moon so we could try to see anymore lights.  it was almost humorous to be eating pizza and the both of us focused on the outside.  eventually we look out the window and pointed at the mysterious light and about the same time an airplane flies near it, which then made me realize what we saw was not at all an airplane. the light in no way resembled an airplane.  the light remained on and eventually disappeared.  minutes later the same colored light comes on in which we both pointed to it in  excitement and then two more lights appeared spaced apart.  as before they remained on for several seconds and disappeared.  my wife and i thought what the hell.  the waitress comes by to fill our cups when i asked her if there have been people in the local area reporting lights or seeing strange objects.  the young girl said there have been reports online and in the coleman paper about people spotting mysterious lights.  even a&e did a report about ufo sightings in stephenville, tx.  we explained to her what we saw when she became excited and said, "really?!"  she started to look out the window and became excited as we were.  i told her now that the out of towners told a third person the mysterious lights will not light up the sky to only show us as being crazy.  i will tell you this, i have never seen anything like that before and my wife and i will say, what we saw that night was not an airplane, but most definately an unidentified flying object.  i truly believe we were visited by the outside.  take care and hopefully this helps.
content.summary: Driving down a lonely texas highway and visited from the world outside

content.detailedDescription: Woke to dog barking, looked at clock 5am, then looked up out through our skylight and noticed bright star pulsating. being an amateur astronomer i did not recognize this constellation. after 20 seconds the object turned a brilliant gold and displayed reflections from the rising sun. it then vanished.  i view many heavenly objects and this may have been an exploding star but due to the size, reflections, and clarity it must have been in leo. there is no sat in this long and lat, very baffling to say the least.
content.summary: Bright gold object

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend  and i sit out and look at the night sky almost every night in the summer we are used to seeing satellites all time but about 3 mounts ago se saw a shooting star coming from the s/east and it stopped no big deal but a few seconds later one came from the s/w and stopped at the same spot freaky but then a third came from the n/w and stopped in the same spot in what looked like perfect 120* angles but then a extremely bright light started flashing right where they all stopped but not in a pattern. ive never been scared by anything i've seen in the sky but that gave me chills (still does) i,ve seen the 3 red light triangles (in tandem) but this scared the crap out of me unfortunately i no longer have a night video  camera so i cannot document what i see..Oh also after that incident there where like 20 or more satellites that appeared to cruse the area. where we are you can see one every few min but they where all in a 10 min period that was weird by itself.The weeks before and after there where a lot of strange things shooting stars and what looked like satellites that changed direction not in a 90* sharp turn but more like an arch. we have not been out much in the last few mounts its winter here but soon we will be out there. we where not looking for that kind of thing its just pretty out here and we like seeing shooting stars this was not expected.
content.summary: Shooting stars turn into blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: Ok for the first time in 3 years of seeing these lights and hundreds of pictures later i was finally able to capture something. its an odd formation not much to look at but this is what appeared.
content.summary: Update to my report a few days ago ..Picture attached

content.detailedDescription: I had just started my night shift at the coal mine i work at.As i started out too the field,two large lights just appeared.These lights were side by side and then rotated then faded away.I stopped my truck to see if what was seen was'nt just a reflection coming from my dash lights.At first i thought it was an aircraft like those huge carriers that fly out of san antonio's lackland air base.A few minuts passed so i started to my destenation, keeping an eye out for something, when halfway there, the lights are back again, this time their spread apart much farther then the first time.The lights were seen for about 5sec.Then one quickly faded out then the other followed there after.I was so excited and emotional at what was going on i wanted to call out to anyone on our two-way radio's who were in my area to look up in the sky to see what i was seeing.But i did'nt want to freak anyone out so remainded quit tell later.Again i sat and waited to see if the lights would reappear,and they did this time much farther apart then the secound time.They seemed to be miles from each other,they flicker on slowly stay on for several seconds and then flicker off again.This time another light appeared between the first two and even further than out.So i finaly got too my first peace of equipment,and i wanted to tell the operator if he saw anything since he was working in the directon of my sightings.I decided to tell the operator what i was seeing,as i described what i saw to him, he points and says "look there it is"one bright light just lit up for several seconds and again faded away.We waited about 5 min.And another bright light just flickerd on and then flickerd out.I remembered the time and date this event happened 2/16/2011@7;45pm it lasted about 30min.
content.summary: Strange flashng lights across night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof at work taking a quick break to enjoy the unseasonably warm weather. i was watching the flight paths of the planes coming to and from the airport when i noticed a faint moving light directly overhead. first i thought it was a satellite, but it was moving too fast. i then figured it was a plane at a high altitude, however as soon as i thought that i noticed another one. they seemed to be cigar shaped with a slight orange glow. at this point they started weaving in and out, stopping and abruptly changing direction. they then quickly moved off to the east and disappeared over new jersey. the whole thing lasted about a minute or less. i was very excited when it was over. i've been temporarily fooled by seagulls reflecting the city lights and chinese lanterns on new years eve, but i really can't explain the objects i saw last night. no photos or video, unfortunately.
content.summary: 2 cigar shaped cafts with a faint orange glow

content.detailedDescription: Cms/mcm last evening while smoking a cigarette on the porch facing south, a diamond pattern of lights can be seen with four points of different colored lights.  there are several previous sightings going back several years.
content.summary: Diamond shapes colors of orange, green, blue, white

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of the full moon in miami and noticed an orb in my camera.  i could not see it with my bare eyes so i kept shooting. i even video taped it from my i-phone. i would have kept watching but my wife kept annoying me about something else that distracted me. afterward i decided to view it on the flat screen. as i was doing that i enlarged the photo and scanned thru it. it is an obvious orb that has a glowing light around it. i looked thru the whole screen and can see different light patterns.  some barely visible circular objects with light surrounding the outer borders of it. i am not someone who knows anything about these things or the heavens.  so i am sending these pictures to you for your advice.  this is not a hoax!!!
content.summary: I was taking a picture of the full moon and noticed an orb in my camera.

content.detailedDescription: The morning of february 7, 2011, i was driving to work.  it was a particularly dark morning, cloudy, and the moon and stars weren't visible.  as i was driving along the two lane highway, off to the west i could see something glowing over a hill, much like a combine looks when it's harvesting at night in the fall, or even like the sun might look as it's coming up over the horizon in the east.  just a glow.  i drove for a mile or two, keeping an eye on the glow, wondering just what it was coming from.  i cleared a hill on the highway and could see around the hill, and as soon as i looked to see what was causing the glow, something shot from the ground to the sky, almost like a falling star would look, except going up instead of down.  it was so fast i didn't have time to make out a shape or any details, except that it seemed to have a greenish glow to the trail it left, which dissipated within seconds.  the whole thing, from time i saw the glow, til it disappeared into the sky, was maybe a minute, tops.  the flash of it disappearing into the sky was very quick.  i was searched the sky to try and see what it was, but couldn't see anything.  the glow had disappeared from over the horizon.  i was quite shaken by what i saw.  i've driven country roads by myself at night and in the dark ever since i was a teenager and nothing's ever made my skin crawl like seeing this did.  i didn't file any reports (what would i say?) and the only people i told were my brother and a friend who is also interested in ufos and unexplained events.  i still drive by that place in the field every morning when i go to work, but haven't seen anything since that day.  i do get an eerie feeling though, just remembering what i saw.
content.summary: Ufo spotted flying out of cornfield from country road

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i went outside of our building at work for a smoke break. i was looking up at the sky and saw the object come over the edge of the building it was approx 9:26 am. i asked my friend do you see that? what is that? it moved quickly silently and with a perfect flat trajectory. as it moved south it passed over the warehouse across the street. it was still in plain sight after about 10 seconds and then just vanished. it was a semi transparent milky white orb with little flashes of bright silver kind of circling it or flashing near the object. my guess is that it was at about 1800ft and moving at about 250-300 mph. i did not get the gut feeling this was alien. this was some sort of high tech drone. would have been very hard to see it on a cloudy overcast day.
content.summary: Semi transparent milky white sphere at about 1800 ft moving north to south, cloudless blue sky bright day. guessing it was about 20 feet in diameter moving at about 250 mph. small points of light circling it.

content.detailedDescription:
2-18-2011 about 1:30 pm cental time.  springfield, il
my sister was driving north on dirksen parkway in the right lane approaching the sangamon avenue stop light, yet still far enough away from the intersection coasting down from the railroad overpass.  i looked east and above the tree line was this motionless metal craft...I made my sister look and said i think that's a ufo but she didn't stop the car or pull it off into either one of two close restaurants on that side of n dirksen pkwy, being sonic and mcdonalds, she was approaching a stop light and i knew that the group of trees by the stop were closer to us and would block the view. even though it's winter and they're bare i still lost sight. so we were trying to think how far away it was.  it was farther east than the tree line, the tree line would be about 300+ feet from the road.  if i were to equate size and distance with my hand holding my arm out, it was the the width of my thumb. it's possible that would put it by highway 55. when the stop light changed, driving north past the trees, it was gone. i saw it for probably less than 30 seconds, it had a highly refective, smooth, slightly angled surface towards the front top (front i'd say facing north). back side wasn't as highlighted from the sun, bottom was shaded.  shape didn't appear disc, or oval because it had angles, bottom wasn't flat at the back it angled a distinct type of fin or area that dropped, bottom was more flat to the front, made the craft look uneven, unbalanced in it's form, but was hanging straight in the sky.  i felt i was looking at it from a side view but could see some of the bottom.  there are also two radio towers that stand among the tree line, it was far enough south of the towers that it couldn't be something attached to the top of the towers.  it was too big for a kite or baloon. i am a bad witness, because i didn't think of my cell phone to visually record it i'm sorry to say.  i'm hoping someone else did.  this probably has nothing to be associated...But within 5 mins we pulled into cullivers parking lot(east from dirksen further north of sangamon) we saw a hellicopter west from dirksen in the sky going north. flying above the buildings.  by the time we are on dirksen again 3 to 4 hours later southbound in the same area, i notice again, west of dirksen the helecopter has reversed direction, heading south...I remarked that the helecopter was a little late on the sceen(& too far north) from our sighting, but it was too weid to see it again around 5:30 heading back.
content.summary: It was silver reflecting sunlight, a cloudless day, motionless in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from getting fast food.  i pulled into my apartment complex and saw out of the top of my vision a fast moving object.  when i first saw it i thought it was a plane or a falling star, but noticed it was far too bright to be a plane.  the light was very bright and clear.  i stopped my car and looked up and it was traveling very fast, then all of the sudden dissappeared.  when it dissappeared, a bright flash of light about 5 times the size of the light appeared then dissappeared very fast.  i've seen a lot of falling stars, but this one was very different.  the light was very strange compared to other lights you normally see at night.
content.summary: Bright white star like object moving very fast, then disappearing in a bright flash.
